text: Je loka svatahvara atyacara karatata, jevha phariste tyance prana tabyata ghetata tevha mhanatata ki tumhi konatya avastheta hote? Te mhanatata, amhi dharativara kamajora hoto. Tevha phariste vicaratata, kaya allahaci jamina visala, vyapaka navhati ki tumhi ticyata sthalantara kele asate. Asaca lokance thikana jahannama ahe ani te mothe va'ita thikana ahe
